A Pragmatic Re-framing of Superintelligence: The Primacy of Agentic Capability over Abstract Intelligence

July 08, 2025 by Pseudonym¹, Collaborator² 15 min read
AI AGI Safety Research
A comprehensive examination of superintelligence discourse, challenging foundational assumptions about unbounded intelligence and proposing a pragmatic reframing toward agentic capability as the primary concern for AGI development and safety.
